ai-patthana16.78:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.78:0.3_0: He should apply himself to see clearly.
ai-patthana16.78:1.1_0: You should give up improper attention to seeing.
ai-patthana16.78:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up improper attention to things.
ai-patthana16.78:3.1_1: You shouldn’t give up improper attention to things.
ai-patthana16.78:3.1_2: not to give up improper attention.
